A series of changes compel him to take on his responsibilities as the head of the family. When life's burdens hit hard, he must confront himself and start anew.

Rong Jinzhen has shown amazing mathematical talent since her childhood, and because she solved the problems assigned by her math teacher, she was noticed by more people, and even walked into the door of code-breaking by mistake.

Producteur de cinÃ©ma, il dispose de peu de temps pour elle, qui, toujours aux petits soins, continue de le materner... Le jour oÃ¹ elle tombe malade, les rÃ´les sâ€™inversent...

Chun Tao-Chung ha trabajado de criada durante mÃ¡s de 60 aÃ±os para la familia Leung. Ahora, el Ãºnico miembro de la familia que sigue viviendo en Hong Kong es Roger, y Tao sigue trabajando para Ã©l. Sin embargo, un dÃ­a Tao sufre un derrame cerebral. Una vez estÃ¡ en el hospital, le anuncia a Roger su intenciÃ³n de abandonar su trabajo e instalarse en una residencia para ancianos.  Roger intenta disuadirla, pero ella tiene la idea muy clara, asÃ­ que Ã©l empieza a buscar una residencia buena donde pueda vivir, y al final encuentra una habitaciÃ³n para Tao en un centro dirigido por un amigo suyo. Poco a poco, al cuidar de Tao, Roger se da cuenta de lo importante que Tao es para Ã©l.
The relationship between a middle-aged man and the elderly woman who has been the family's helper for sixty years.

Jia You Wei, a middle-aged man who has accomplished nothing, is diagnosed with a brain tumor and has only ten days left to live. He sells his old house, rumored to be demolished and reunites with several others who used to live there. They decide to indulge themselves in the final ten days of their lives. In this way, the quintet who parted ways 22 years ago in the family compound gathered together once again, only to realize that each of them has faced their own hardships in life.

localized_description.text: Li Wenxiu, a Han Chinese girl who grew up in Altay, is determined to pursue her literary dream in a big city. However, she repeatedly encounters obstacles and is forced to return to her hometown to rely on her mother (played by Ma Yili) who runs a small shop. After meeting Kazakh boy Batai (played by Yu Shi), Wenxiu gradually discovered the beauty of the local area.

DOG lives in Manhattan and heâ€™s tired of being alone. One day he decides to build himself a robot, a companion. Their friendship blossoms, until they become inseparable, to the rhythm of 80â€™s NYC. One summer night, DOG, with great sadness, is forced to abandon ROBOT at the beach. Will they ever meet again?
ROBOT DREAMS is the first animation film by the award-winning director Pablo Berger (Blancanieves). A story about friendship, its importance, and its fragility.

In einer nahen Zukunft wird die Menschheit von einer rÃ¤tselhaften Krankheit heimgesucht, die einige Menschen nach und nach in tierÃ¤hnliche Kreaturen verwandelt. In a world hit by a wave of mutations transforming humans into animals, FranÃ§ois does everything he can to save his wife. As some of the creatures disappear into a nearby forest, he and their son Ã‰mile embark on a quest that will change their lives forever.

In un futuro prossimo, misteriose mutazioni trasformano gli esseri umani in ibridi animali. Ã‰mile ha solo 16 anni e vorrebbe una vita normale: la scuola, le serate con gli amici, i primi amori. Ma dâ€™un tratto si trova a fare i conti con alcuni inaspettati cambiamentiâ€¦

The blind swordsman, skilled in martial arts, named Cheng Xiazizi (played by Xie Miao), accidentally saves Zhang Xiaoyu (played by Yang Enyou), who has suffered from the destruction of his family. Under the persuasion of the orphan Xiaoyu, Cheng Xiazizi reluctantly keeps him by his side and teaches him skills. Xiaoyu also waits for the opportunity to seek revenge.

Jack Campbell es un egocÃ©ntrico broker de Wall Street cuya Ãºnica obsesiÃ³n es el trabajo y una vida llena de lujo. Tras un incidente en una tienda el dÃ­a de Nochebuena, se despierta viviendo otra vida: es un humilde vendedor de neumÃ¡ticos de Nueva Jersey, casado con su antigua novia Kate, a la que habÃ­a abandonado hacÃ­a aÃ±os para que no obstaculizara su carrera en el mundo de las finanzas.

Jack's lavish, fast-paced lifestyle changes one Christmas night when he stumbles into a grocery store holdup and disarms the gunman. The next morning he wakes up in bed lying next to Kate, his college sweetheart he left in order to pursue his career, and to the horrifying discovery that his former life no longer exists. As he stumbles through this alternate suburban universe, Jack finds himself at a crossroad where he must choose between his high-power career and the woman he loves.

Tang Lung arrives in Rome to help his cousins in the restaurant business. They are being pressured to sell their property to the syndicate, who will stop at nothing to get what they want. Han perÃ² prende a cuore le sorti del ragazzo e gli diventa amico, insegnandogli in poco tempo tutto quello che c'Ã¨ da sapere sul drifting.

O terceiro filme da saga Velocidade furiosa, desta vez sem Vin Diesel nem Paul Walker, este Velocidade Furiosa conta a historia de um jovem americano que Ã© obrigado a mudar-se para TÃ³quio depois de uma corrida correr mal, mas em TÃ³quio torna-se num grande concorrente no mundo do drift, desafiando membros da Yakuza.

Sean liebt illegale StraÃŸenrennen, welche ihm aber schon des Ã–fteren groÃŸe Schwierigkeiten bereiteten und er durch sie nun kurz vor dem Jugendknast steht. Die letzte Alternative ist sein Vater in Tokio, bei dem er unterkommt und bei dem er sich keine Fehltritte erlauben darf. Doch schon nach kurzer Zeit lernt er Twinkie kennen, der ihn in die Rennszene Tokios einfÃ¼hrt. Allerdings stellt Sean beim ersten Rennen in einem Parkhaus fest, dass hier anders gefahren wird: Driften steht an der Tagesordnung - ein Fahrstil, von dem er vorher nie gehÃ¶rt hat. Als er dort seine MitschÃ¼lerin Neela anspricht und ihr Freund D.K. daraufhin die Fronten klÃ¤rt, fordert Sean ihn zu einem Rennen heraus. Nur mit D.K.s Partner Han kann Sean Ã¼berhaupt in einem Auto an die Startlinie fahren, welches wÃ¤hrend des Rennens allerdings einen Totalschaden erleidet. FÃ¼r eine Revanche muss er erstmal das Driften lernen...

Pour Ã©viter la prison, Sean Boswell est envoyÃ© pour vivre avec son pÃ¨re militaire Ã  Tokyo. Lors de premiÃ¨re course de drift, l'adolescent qui se prend pour une tÃªte brÃ»lÃ©e des courses de rues ne sait pas qu'il affronte Â« le roi du drift Â», un champion local de mÃ¨che avec la machine criminelle japonaise Yakuza.

Shaun Boswell es un chico que no acaba de encajar en ningÃºn grupo. Su Ãºnica conexiÃ³n con el mundo de indiferencia que le rodea es a travÃ©s de las carreras ilegales, lo que no le ha convertido en el chico favorito de la policÃ­a. Cuando amenazan con encarcelarle, le mandan fuera del paÃ­s a pasar una temporada con su tÃ­o, un militar destinado en JapÃ³n. En el paÃ­s donde nacieron la mayorÃ­a de los coches modificados, las simples carreras en la calle principal han sido sustituidas por el Ãºltimo reto automovilÃ­stico que desafÃ­a la gravedad, las carreras de "drift" (arrastre), una peligrosa mezcla de velocidad en pistas con curvas muy cerradas y en zigzag. En su primera incursiÃ³n en el salvaje mundo de las carreras de "drift", Shaun acepta ingenuamente conducir un D.K, el Rey del Drift, que pertenece a los Yakuza, la mafia japonesa. Para pagar su deuda, no tiene mÃ¡s remedio que codearse con el hampa de Tokio y jugarse la vida.
In order to avoid a jail sentence, Sean Boswell heads to Tokyo to live with his military father. In a low-rent section of the city, Shaun gets caught up in the underground world of drift racing

Jackie Chan stars as Asian Hawk, an Indiana Jones-style adventurer looking to make a fortune in exotic antiquities. After Hawk discovers a mysterious sword in Africa, a band of Satan-worshipping monks kidnap his ex-girlfriend Lorelei, demanding the sword as ransom as well as other pieces of the legendary Armour of God - a magical outfit dating back to the Crusades.

Hong Kong. When Cao Nan and his group of thieves rob an armored car in broad daylight, they don't hesitate to murder innocent people on the run. Lui Ming Chit, a veteran police inspector, is forced to use sinister tactics to catch them.

The X-Men face their most formidable and powerful foe when one of their own, Jean Grey, starts to spiral out of control. During a rescue mission in outer space, Jean is nearly killed when she's hit by a mysterious cosmic force. Kongwen Lu (Dong Zijian) es autor de una serie de novelas de fantasÃ­a que narran las aventuras de un heroico adolescente, tambiÃ©n llamado Kongwen, en su bÃºsqueda, bajo la guÃ­a de 'Armadura negra' (Guo Jingfei), por poner fin al tirÃ¡nico gobierno de Lord Redmane. Kongwen Lu is the author of a fantasy novel series following a heroic teenager, also named Kongwen, on a quest to end the tyrannical rule of Lord Redmane, under the guidance of a Black Armor. But through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world, leading Guan Ning to accept a mission from Tu Ling to kill the author.

Narra la historia sobre un ambicioso periodista que investiga con interÃ©s un accidente olvidado hace mucho tiempo. Cuando el Ãºnico superviviente del accidente de repente desaparece, se da cuenta de que nada es lo que parece, y la oscura verdad inimaginable le atormentarÃ¡ por el resto de su vida.

An ambitious journalist who witnessed a hit-and-run years ago reboots his investigation led by newly emerged clues. As he beats the clock to save the only survivor after her sudden disappearance, layers of unimaginable dark truths around a corrupted system start peeling.

localized_description.text: AmÃ©lie cresce in provincia, siamo in Francia. Suo padre Ã¨ un medico fin troppo originale: visita ogni mese la figlia, che si agita ogni volta, e crede che sia malata di cuore. La madre, uscita dalla chiesa, viene schiacciata da una suicida. PiÃ¹ grande la ragazza va a Parigi. Fa la cameriera e incontra tanta gente. Il 31 agosto 1997 Ã¨ il giorno decisivo della sua vita: vede in tv il servizio dulla morte di lady Diana, le cade di mano un tappo di bottiglia che finisce sotto una piastrella, dove AmÃ©lie trova una vecchia scatola di cianfrusaglie (figurine, la foto di un calciatore, un ciclista di ferro). Si mette in testa di rintracciare il proprietario, che a quel punto avrÃ  una cinquantina d'anni. Lo trova, gli restituisce il "ricordo" e gli cambia la vita.

Amelie har haft en trist barndom uden kÃ¦rlighed og arbejder nu som tjener. Hun har en romantisk og fantasifuld natur, og en dag beslutter hun sig for fremover at gribe ind i andre menneskers liv for at bringe lykke og glÃ¦de. De bringer hende i kontakt med en lang rÃ¦kke mennesker, heriblandt den hypokondriske Georgette, den aldrende og skrÃ¸belige kunstner Dufayel og den ensomme Nino, der er ekspedient i en videoforretning.

ApÃ³s deixar a famÃ­lia e ir viver para Paris a fim de trabalhar, a inocente AmÃ©lie encontra uma caixa escondida em sua casa. Pensando que pertenceria ao antigo morador, decide procurÃ¡-lo e Ã© assim que encontra Dominique. Ao ver que ele chora de alegria ao reaver o objecto, ela fica impressionada e adquire uma nova visÃ£o do mundo. EntÃ£o, a partir de pequenos gestos, passa a ajudar as pessoas que a rodeiam, vendo nisto um novo sentido para sua existÃªncia.

Im Herzen von Paris arbeitet die schÃ¼chterne AmÃ©lie als Kellnerin in einem kleinen StraÃŸencafÃ©. Eine Wendung nimmt das vergleichsweise ereignisarme, von kuriosen Alltagsbeobachtungen gewÃ¼rzte Leben der jungen Frau, als sie eine Schachtel mit Kindheitserinnerungen eines Fremden entdeckt und dem ursprÃ¼nglichen Besitzer damit groÃŸe Freude bereitet. Fortan macht es sich AmÃ©lie zur Lebensaufgabe, helfend in das Schicksal ihrer Mitmenschen einzugreifen. Nur als es um das eigene LiebesglÃ¼ck geht, scheint ihr Talent zu versagen.

AmÃ©lie, une jeune serveuse dans un bar de Montmartre, passe son temps Ã  observer les gens et Ã  laisser son imagination divaguer. Elle s'est fixÃ©e un but : faire le bien de ceux qui l'entourent. Elle invente alors des stratagÃ¨mes pour intervenir incognito dans leur existence. Le chemin d'AmÃ©lie est jalonnÃ© de rencontres: Georgette, la buraliste hypocondriaque, Lucien, le commis d'Ã©picerie, Madeleine Wallace, la concierge portÃ©e sur le porto et les chiens empaillÃ©s, ou encore Raymond Dufayel alias Â« l'homme de verre Â», son voisin qui ne vit qu'Ã  travers une reproduction d'un tableau de Renoir. Cette quÃªte du bonheur amÃ¨ne AmÃ©lie Ã  faire la connaissance de Nino Quincampoix, un Ã©trange Â« prince charmant Â». Celui-ci partage son temps entre un train fantÃ´me et un sex-shop, et cherche Ã  identifier un inconnu dont la photo rÃ©apparaÃ®t sans cesse dans plusieurs cabines de photomaton.

AmÃ©lie Poulain (Audrey Tautou) es una joven camarera que vive en ParÃ­s y que tiene una imaginaciÃ³n desbordante. Un dÃ­a, encuentra una caja con objetos antiguos que pertenecÃ­an al antiguo inquilino de su apartamento. AmÃ©lie decide devolver la caja a su dueÃ±o y ver su reacciÃ³n. Al ver la felicidad que le provoca, AmÃ©lie se propone hacer felices a los demÃ¡s con pequeÃ±os gestos. AsÃ­, ayuda a sus vecinos, a sus compaÃ±eros de trabajo y a su padre, mientras se divierte con sus ocurrencias. Pero en su bÃºsqueda de la felicidad ajena, AmÃ©lie se olvida de la suya propia, hasta que conoce a Nino Quincampoix (Mathieu Kassovitz), un joven coleccionista de fotos que le roba el corazÃ³n.

At a tiny Parisian cafÃ©, the adorable yet painfully shy AmÃ©lie accidentally discovers a gift for helping others. Soon Amelie is spending her days as a matchmaker, guardian angel, and all-around do-gooder. But when she bumps into a handsome stranger, will she find the courage to become the star of her very own love story?

Sanjay Singhania, un rico hombre de negocios, dueÃ±o de una compaÃ±Ã­a de telÃ©fonos mÃ³viles llamada Air Voice, es herido en la cabeza con una vara de metal. Sanjay sobrevive al golpe, pero adquiere una extraÃ±a amnesia debido al trauma de su lesiÃ³n cerebral. En un momento dado, Ã©l no recuerda nada de lo que pasÃ³ mÃ¡s de 15 minutos hacia atrÃ¡s, aunque con frecuencia tiene flashbacks del asesinato de Kalpana, una joven de la que estuvo enamorado. A man suffering from anterograde amnesia as a result of a violent attack in the past sets out to avenge his girlfriend's death with the aid of photographs, notes and tattoos all over his body.

En 1980 furent perpÃ©trÃ©es en CorÃ©e du Sud, des exactions envers des civils qui demandaient plus de libertÃ©, point dâ€™orgue dâ€™un long mouvement de contestation nationale. Ce sombre Ã©vÃ©nement est connu sous le nom du massacre de Gwangju. 26 ans plus tard, de jeunes CorÃ©ens issus de tous les milieux vont s'unir pour faire payer les responsables...

Hace 26 aÃ±os, las tropas estatales recibieron la orden de abrir fuego contra civiles de la ciudad de Gwangju que se manifestaban como parte de un movimiento democrÃ¡tico. Miles de ellos fueron asesinados. Ahora, un equipo de personas decide involucrarse en un plan para condenar a la persona responsable de la masacre.

26 years ago, state troops were ordered to open fire on civilians in the city of Gwangju who were demonstrating as apart of a democratic movement. Thousands of civilians were killed. Now, a shooter from the national team, a gang member, a policeman, CEO from a large company and director of a private security outfit get involved in a plan to convict the person responsible for the massacre.

Picking up immediately after the events in Resident Evil: Retribution, Alice is the only survivor of what was meant to be humanity's final stand against the undead. Now, she must return to where the nightmare began - The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

localized_description.text: En engang lovende bryder jagter den guldmedalje, han aldrig vandt, ved at trÃ¦ne to af sine dÃ¸tre til Commonwealth Games.
Uma ex-promessa da luta livre persegue a medalha de ouro que nunca ganhou ao treinar duas das suas filhas para competir nos Jogos da Commonwealth.

Mahavir ist leidenschaftlicher Ringer, und auf dem Weg nach ganz oben. Sein Vater zwingt ihn jedoch, den Kampfsport aufzugeben. Also will Mahavir spÃ¤ter seinem eigenen Sohn ermÃ¶glichen, Ringer zu werden, wenn dieser denn will. Wer hÃ¤tte gedacht, dass auch die TÃ¶chter plÃ¶tzlich Talent fÃ¼rs Wrestling an den Tag legen?
Un ancien champion de lutte cherche Ã  dÃ©crocher la mÃ©daille d'or qu'il n'a jamais remportÃ©e en entraÃ®nant deux de ses filles pour les Jeux du Commonwealth.
Mahavir Singh Phogat es un entrenador de lucha libre que prepara a sus hijas Babita Kumari y Geeta.

Dangal is an extraordinary true story based on the life of Mahavir Singh and his two daughters, Geeta and Babita Phogat. The film traces the inspirational journey of a father who trains his daughters to become world class wrestlers.

Doch als Ellas Vater tragischerweise stirbt, zeigt sich das wahre Gesicht ihrer neuen Stiefmutter. Fortan lebt sie als DienstmÃ¤dchen im eigenen Haus und wird Cinderella genannt. Nach einer schicksalshaften Begegnung im Wald mit dem gutaussehenden Fremden, schÃ¶pft sie die Hoffnung, dass es einen Seelenverwandten und ein besseres Leben fÃ¼r sie gibt. Ohne zu wissen, dass sich hinter dem geheimnisvollen Fremden in Wahrheit der Prinz verbirgt, mÃ¶chte sie der Einladung des KÃ¶nigshauses folgen, die sich an alle Damen des Reiches richtet, um dort ihr GlÃ¼ck zu finden. Doch ihre Stiefmutter will dies mit allen Mitteln verbieten und so muss erst ein Wunder geschehen, um Ella und ihren Prinz zusammenzufÃ¼hrenâ€¦

AprÃ¨s la mort de la mÃ¨re de la jeune Ella, son pÃ¨re, un marchand, se remarie. Ella accueille chaleureusement sa belleâ€mÃ¨re, Lady Tremaine, et ses deux filles Anastasia et Drisella. Mais lorsque le pÃ¨re dâ€™Ella disparaÃ®t Ã  son tour, les trois femmes vont faire dâ€™Ella une servante.

Cuenta las andanzas de Ella, una joven cuyo padre, un comerciante, vuelve a casarse tras enviudar. Para agradar a su padre, acoge con cariÃ±o a su madrastra y a sus hijas en la casa familiar. Pero, cuando su padre muere inesperadamente, la joven queda a merced de unas mujeres celosas y malvadas que la convierten en sirvienta y la relegan a la cocina. Pero, a pesar de la crueldad con la que la tratan, estÃ¡ dispuesta a cumplir las Ãºltimas palabras de su madre que le dijo que debÃ­a "ser valiente y amable".

When her father unexpectedly passes away, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her daughters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger in the woods.

An arrogant, high-powered attorney takes on the case of a poor altar boy found running away from the scene of the grisly murder of the bishop who has taken him in. The case gets a lot more complex when the accused reveals that there may or may not have been a third person in the room.

Alle verweisen auf eine sagenumwobene Bruderschaft, deren Mitglieder seit 2000 Jahren ein machtvolles Geheimnis bewahren. De Paris Ã  Londres, puis en Ã‰cosse, Langdon et Sophie vont tout tenter pour dÃ©chiffrer le code et approcher les secrets qui remettent en cause les fondements mÃªmes de l'humanitÃ©...

Con la ayuda de la criptÃ³grafa de la policÃ­a Sophie Neveu y poniendo en juego su propia vida, Langdon descubre que la obra de Leonardo Da Vinci esconde una serie de misterios que apuntan a una sociedad secreta encargada de custodiar un antiguo secreto que ha permanecido oculto durante dos mil aÃ±os...

Um garoto de 5 anos chamado Sosuke fica amigo de uma princesa peixinho-dourado chamada Ponyo, que quer desesperadamente virar humana.

Brunhilde ist ein FischmÃ¤dchen, das nicht nur zaubern kann - es ist auch verdammt neugierig. Eines Tages gelingt es ihr, mithilfe einer Qualle an die WasseroberflÃ¤che zu kommen. Doch dort verfÃ¤ngt sie sich in einem Marmeladenglas, aus dem ihr der aufgeweckte Junge Sosuke heraushilft. Der FÃ¼nfjÃ¤hrige ist von dem FischgeschÃ¶pf, das er als Goldfisch bezeichnet, sofort angetan, tauft es auf den Namen Ponyo und nimmt es in einem mit Wasser gefÃ¼llten Eimer mit zur Grundschule. Menschenjunge und FischmÃ¤dchen freunden sich an, doch dann wird Ponyo von ihrem erzÃ¼rnten Vater ins Meer zurÃ¼ckgeholt. Sie mÃ¶chte aber unbedingt bei ihrem geliebten Freund Sosuke an der OberflÃ¤che bleiben und selbst ein Menschenkind werden. Also setzt sie ihre magischen KrÃ¤fte ein, um zu Sosuke und seiner resoluten Mutter Lisa zurÃ¼ckzukehren, und missachtet dabei die gefÃ¤hrlichen Konsequenzen...
La trame suit une petite princesse poisson rouge appelÃ©e Ponyo qui veut dÃ©sespÃ©rÃ©ment devenir humaine. En cherchant ce faire, elle devient amie d'un garÃ§on de cinq ans, SÃ´suke.

When Sosuke, a young boy who lives on a clifftop overlooking the sea, rescues a stranded goldfish named Ponyo, he discovers more than he bargained for. Ponyo is a curious, energetic young creature who yearns to be human, but even as she causes chaos around the house, her father, a powerful sorcerer, schemes to return Ponyo to the sea.

Charlie Simms is a student at a private preparatory school who comes from a poor family. To earn the money for his flight home to Gresham, Oregon for Christmas, Charlie takes a job over Thanksgiving looking after retired U.S. Army officer Lieutenant Colonel Frank Slade, a cantankerous middle-aged man who lives with his niece and her family.

Arthur Bishop is a 'mechanic' - an elite assassin with a strict code requiring professional perfection and total detachment. One of an elite group of assassins, Bishop may be the best in the business - with a unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. When Harry McKenna, his close friend and mentor, is murdered, Harry's son comes to him with vengeance in his heart and a desire to learn Bishop's trade, signaling the birth of a deadly partnership.

O Eduardo ficou triste e sozinho, atÃ© que uma gentil vendedora da Avon convidou-o para morar com a famÃ­lia dela na fantÃ¡stica terra de Suburbia.

Ein Erfinder hat den groÃŸen Traum, einen kÃ¼nstlichen Menschen zu erschaffen. Doch bevor er Edward vollenden kann, stirbt er an einem Herzinfarkt. Von da an lebt Edward alleine in dessen Schloss weiter und hat dort Scheren wo eigentlich seine HÃ¤nde sein sollten. Eines Tages macht sein Leben eine Wendung, als die Avon-Vertreterin Peg das Schloss betritt. Peg nimmt den Jungen mit den ScherenhÃ¤nden bei sich auf. Edward nâ€™est pas un garÃ§on ordinaire. CrÃ©ation dâ€™un inventeur, il a reÃ§u un cÅ“ur pour aimer, un cerveau pour comprendre. Mais son concepteur est mort avant dâ€™avoir pu terminer son Å“uvre et Edward se retrouve avec des lames de mÃ©tal et des instruments tranchants en guise de doigts.

Per la strade di Los Angeles, gli amanti di motori e velocitÃ  competono in gare clandestine, sfrecciando su automobili dalle carene fiammanti e dai carburanti pompati a protossido di azoto. Incaricato di indagare su un clan di rapinatori che trafugano camion in corsa, il giovane agente Brian O'Conner si addentra sotto copertura nel mondo delle corse illegali entrando in contatto con il nerboruto Dominic Toretto, un esperto meccanico ed eccezionale pilota. Dopo aver perso una corsa contro di lui, Brian riesce a metterlo in salvo dalla polizia e da quel momento si aprono per lui le porte del garage e della famiglia di Toretto, dove non proprio tutti sono bendisposti ad accoglierlo.

Dominic Toretto is a Los Angeles street racer suspected of masterminding a series of big-rig hijackings. When undercover cop Brian O'Conner infiltrates Toretto's iconoclastic crew, he falls for Toretto's sister and must choose a side: the gang or the LAPD.
